Original: You enter a deeper level of the Hall
You notice first its distinct smell.
Though you are in a man-made ruin,
this floor has the aroma of a forest.
The unnatural smell of plants reminds
you of the Titan of Yggdrasil you had
a pitched battle with not long ago.
For a fleeting moment, the dreadful
thought that the Titan still slumbers
But you cannot seriously believe that
anything on par with Yggdrasil's power
is down here. You continue walking...

a pitched battle with not long ago.
For a fleeting moment, the dreadful
thought that the Titan still slumbers
But you cannot seriously believe that
anything on par with Yggdrasil's power
is down here. You continue walking...
